msg: Mouse pointer was not changing to resize cursor when over a resizable view.

author: rcmatthews
msg: When a reference is to a previously destroyed this store will recreate an empty object with it resolve state set to 'destroyed'.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Destroyed objects are now marked as such with a ResolveState of DESTROYED.
Views are created with a warning "destroyed" border when the above flag is set up.
